statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (11,-13) and (8,7).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{{7}-{\left(-{13}\right)}}}{{{8}-{\left({11}\right)}}}=\frac{{20}}{{-{{3}}}} which reduces to \displaystyle-\frac{{20}}{{3}} (if it's not already reduced)
